condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Independent institutions, government and civil society have strengthened capacity to monitor child rights in line with international norms.

description.narrative: As a direct result of years of collaboration and partnership between UNICEF Morocco and CNDH, the first appeal mechanism for children victims of violation of their rights, established in the MENA region was approved in September 2019 by the General Assembly of the National Council for Human Rights (CNDH). The new mechanism established has the mandate to receive complaints submitted directly by children victims of violations and to carry out all inquiries related to complaints received and review and decide on them. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:15/01/2020

title.narrative: Number of periodical government reports and civil society parallel reports on child rights produced with effective participation of children
